subject: Your customers are waiting—time to hit send! ?
description_text:
​ 
 Hi there, 
 Your customers are waiting to hear from you. It's time to send your first newsletter with Seguno! Check out the walkthrough video to get started. 
 [Image "Email+thumbnails+%2821%29.png?expires=1775078550&signature=d2559cc5590535ef7d7c58129118238fe18cded03f5aba4dd40adfe52dc5fa85&req=dSMuEs97lIhWWfMW2XS%2FiSFqjjSezT6cbaLKEoHTlKgcYrNxFRA%3D%0A"] 
 Get started with newsletters
